description: A Collaborative To-Do App with Auth & Realtime Updates

coreFeatures.name: User Authentication
coreFeatures.description: Email/password or OAuth via NextAuth.js or Supabase

coreFeatures.name: Task List Management
coreFeatures.description: Create/manage task lists with title, description, due date, priority

coreFeatures.name: Collaboration
coreFeatures.description: Share task lists with other users

coreFeatures.name: Real-time Updates
coreFeatures.description: Real-time task updates using Supabase Realtime or WebSockets

coreFeatures.name: Task Operations
coreFeatures.description: Mark tasks complete, delete, and edit

coreFeatures.name: Responsive Design
coreFeatures.description: Responsive UI for Mobile and Desktop

bonusFeatures.name: Notifications
bonusFeatures.description: Notifications via browser or email using Resend

bonusFeatures.name: Audit Log
bonusFeatures.description: Audit log of task changes (who did what and when)
